MemoryInfobox.name: A Stolen Offering
MemoryInfobox.description: 'A priestess who claimed to be the fifth of her family line to guard her temple sought help when bandits stole sacred offerings.'

General_Description: '''A Stolen Offering''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra was hired by a priestess to deal with bandits.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
